identificationModule.briefTitle: Cardiovascular Effects of a Healthy Dietary Pattern Containing Eggs
identificationModule.officialTitle: Cardiovascular Effects of a Healthy Dietary Pattern Containing Eggs: a Controlled-feeding Study

descriptionModule.briefSummary: This study will examine the effect of a healthy diet containing 2 eggs per day compared to a healthy diet containing 3 eggs per week on biomarkers of heart health after 4 weeks.
descriptionModule.detailedDescription: This is a 2-period, randomized, crossover, controlled feeding study examining the effect of 2020-2025 Dietary Guidelines for Americans adherent dietary patterns containing 2 eggs/day/2000 kcal (HD+E) compared to 3 eggs/week/2000 kcal (HD) on biomarkers of cardiovascular health and function after 4 weeks.

armGroups.label: Healthy Diet + Eggs (HD+E)
armGroups.description: 2020-2025 Dietary Guidelines for Americans adherent dietary pattern containing 2 eggs/day/2000 kcal

armGroups.label: Healthy Diet (HD)
armGroups.description: 2020-2025 Dietary Guidelines for Americans adherent dietary pattern containing 3 eggs/week/2000 kcal (HD)

primaryOutcomes.description: Assessed from fasting blood draw expressed in mg/dL. LDL-cholesterol will be measured directly via enzymatic assay. Change in LDL-cholesterol will be calculated as the mean of the end of diet measures (i.e., mean of day 1 and day 2 values) minus the mean of the baseline measures (i.e., mean of day 1 and day 2 values).

secondaryOutcomes.description: Assessed from fasting blood draw expressed in mg/dL.
Assessed from fasting blood draw expressed in mg/dL.
Assessed from fasting blood draw expressed in mg/dL.
LDL-cholesterol and HDL-cholesterol will be measured from a fasting blood draw expressed in mg/dL. The ratio will be calculated as LDL-C divided by HDL-C

secondaryOutcomes.measure: Change in particle size and number of LDL, HDL, VLDL and chylomicrons
Change in central systolic and diastolic blood pressure
secondaryOutcomes.description: Blood pressure measured assessed using a SphymoCor Xcel (Atcor Medical)

secondaryOutcomes.measure: Change in brachial systolic and diastolic blood pressure
secondaryOutcomes.description: Blood pressure measured assessed using a SphymoCor Xcel (Atcor Medical)
Serum insulin levels assessed in a fasting blood draw and expressed in micro IU/ml

secondaryOutcomes.measure: Change in fasting plasma glucose concentration
secondaryOutcomes.description: Glucose assessed in a fasting blood draw and expressed in mg/dL
Fructosamine assess in a fasting blood draw and expressed in micro IU/ml

secondaryOutcomes.measure: Change in Homeostatic Model Assessment for Insulin Resistance (HOMA-IR)
secondaryOutcomes.description: Calculated from insulin and glucose measured from a fasting blood sample. Calculated as (insulin × glucose) / 22.5

secondaryOutcomes.measure: Change in carotid-femoral pulse wave velocity
secondaryOutcomes.description: A measure of arterial stiffness assessed using a SphymoCor Xcel (Atcor Medical). Expressed in meters/second.
Measured in fasting blood. Expressed as µmol/L
Measured in fasting blood. Expressed as µmol/L
Measured in fasting blood. Expressed as µmol/L

otherOutcomes.measure: Change in the composition of the gut microbiota
otherOutcomes.description: Abundance measured using 16 s rRNA sequencing

eligibilityModule.eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* LDL-C ≥115 mg/dL and ≤190 mg/L
* BMI of 25-35 kg/m2
* Intake of \<14 eggs/week for the prior 3 months
* Blood pressure \<140/90 mmHg
* Fasting blood glucose \<126 mg/dL
* Fasting triglycerides \<350 mg/dL
* ≤10% change in body weight in the prior 6 months

Exclusion Criteria:

* Type 1 or type 2 diabetes or fasting blood glucose ≥126 mg/dL
* Prescription of anti-hypertensive, lipid lowering or glucose lowering drugs
* Intake of supplements that affect the outcomes of interest and unwilling to cease during the study period
* Diagnosed liver, kidney, or autoimmune disease
* Prior cardiovascular event (e.g., stroke, heart attack)
* Current pregnancy or intention of pregnancy within the next 6 months
* Lactation within prior 6 months
* Follows a vegetarian or vegan diet
* Food allergies/intolerance/sensitives/dislikes of foods included in the study menu
* Antibiotic use within the prior 1 month
* Oral steroid use within the prior 1 month
* Use of tobacco or nicotine containing products with in the past 6 months
* Cancer any site within the past 10 years (eligible if ≥10 years without recurrence) or non-melanoma skin cancer with in the past 5 years (eligible if ≥5 years without recurrence)
* Participation in another clinical trial within 30 days of baseline
* Currently following a restricted or weight loss diet
* Prior bariatric surgery
* Intake of \>14 alcoholic drinks/week and/or lack of willingness to consume a maximum of two standard drinks per week while enrolled in the study and/or not willing to avoid alcohol consumption for 48 hour prior to test visits

ipdSharingStatementModule.description: De-identified individual participant data will be deposited into an open access repository once results from all pre-specified primary and secondary outcomes are published.
ipdSharingStatementModule.timeFrame: After publication of all pre-specified primary and secondary outcomes
